class.name: prx_planning/manipulation_world_model
class.description: A world model which deals with the manipulation problems.

class.name: prx_planning/simple_pap_tp
class.description: A task planner for a simple pick and place manipulation problem.

class.name: prx_planning/simple_place_tp
class.description: A task planner for a simple placement manipulation problem.

class.name: prx_planning/suggested_grasp_tp
class.description: A task planner for testing suggested grasps in the manipulation problem.

class.name: prx_planning/multi_pap_tp
class.description: A task planner for dual-arm multiple pick and place manipulation problems.

class.name: prx_planning/pap_trajectory_generator_tp
class.description: A task planner for generating pick and place trajectories for both arms for multiple object poses.

class.name: prx_planning/manipulation_tp
class.description: A task planner for a simple manipulation problem.

class.name: prx_planning/grasp_evaluation_tp
class.description: A task planner for a evaluating all grasps.

class.name: prx_planning/pag_evaluation_tp
class.description: A task planner for a evaluating grasps on multiple poses of an object.

class.name: prx_planning/astar_test_tp
class.description: A task planner for testing the validity of the constraints A*.

class.name: prx_planning/grasping_planner
class.description: A planner for dealing with grasping an object.

class.name: prx_planning/apc_grasping_planner
class.description: A grasping planner that reasons about the different objects faces.

class.name: prx_planning/grasp_db_fusion_tp
class.description: A grasping planner that fuses the databases

class.name: prx_planning/rrt_grasping_planner
class.description: A planner for dealing with grasping an object with additional motion planning primitives.

class.name: prx_planning/face_hidden_grasping_planner
class.description: A planner for dealing with grasping an object, where the face of the object on the surface is removed.

class.name: prx_planning/manipulation_query
class.description: The query for the manipulation problem.

class.name: prx_planning/object_constraints_checker
class.description: The validity checker for the minimum constraint problem. Knows about constraints with objects in the world.

class.name: prx_planning/grasping_specification
class.description: The specification for the grasping planner.

class.name: prx_planning/manipulation_specification
class.description: The specification for the manipulation task planner.

class.name: prx_planning/simple_pap_specification
class.description: The specification for the simple pick and place task planner.

class.name: prx_planning/simple_place_specification
class.description: The specification for the simple place task planner.

class.name: prx_planning/end_effector_distacne
class.description: A distance function which uses the end-effector configuration to compute distance.
